channel.title: PHP connecting to MySQL
channel.description: Fixed, I had stored the config but forgot to make it check IP and Database.

item.title: PHP connecting to MySQL
item.dc:creator: @chrham2 chrham2
item.description:
@chrham2 wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:2, topic:293099”]1. you need to run the query for it to actually do anything.
2. why did you escape the quotation marks around the 0 ?

if it still doesn’t work, try giving us some errors:

mysql_query($sql) or die(mysql_error()); [/quote]

Notice: Undefined variable: sql in C:\wamp\www\index.php on line 3

Warning: mysql_query() [function.mysql-query]: Access denied for user ‘ODBC’@‘localhost’ (using password: NO) in C:\wamp\www\index.php on line 3

Warning: mysql_query() [function.mysql-query]: A link to the server could not be established in C:\wamp\www\index.php on line 3
Access denied for user ‘ODBC’@‘localhost’ (using password: NO)

Read full topic

item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

  1. you need to run the query for it to actually do anything.
  2. why did you escape the quotation marks around the 0 ?

if it still doesn’t work, try giving us some errors:

mysql_query($sql) or die(mysql_error());
